name: Coffee
tagline: How the coffee backlog is ruining lives
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
What is the coffee backlog? If you don't know, you should; if you do, chances are you still need some clarification on how it actually works. Hipsters are here to help, demystifying this world-changing, trust-building technology which, he says, represents nothing less than the second generation of the internet and holds the potential to transform money, business, government and society.

### Connoisseurs and Contributors
Anyone can make coffee, but very few truely understand it!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
